actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to adjust target prices established under the Agriculture and Consumer Protection Act of 1973, as amended for the 1974 through 1977 crops of wheat and feed grains and cotton to reflect changes in farm production costs.

summary.text: Provides for the adjustment of target prices established under the Agriculture and Consumer Protection Act of 1973, as amended, for the 1974 through 1977 crops of wheat and feed grains and cotton to reflect changes in farm production costs.

titles.title: A bill to adjust target prices established under the Agriculture and Consumer Protection Act of 1973, as amended for the 1974 through 1977 crops of wheat and feed grains and cotton to reflect changes in farm production costs.
